Pandas Utility Functions (pandas_)ÔÉÅ

‚ú® a set of functions that extends from pandas to reduce code duplicacy ‚ú®

  • pandas_ module
  • pandas_wrappers_ module

Getting Started

The code is publically available at GitHub gists which is a simple platform for sharing code snippets with the community. To use the code, simply clone the code like:

git clone https://gist.github.com/ZenithClown/e4a0183d9124b3b78cce5a5dc8607323.git pandas_
export PYTHONPATH="${PYTHONPATH}:pandas_"

Done, you can now easily import the function with python notebooks/code-files like:

import pandas_ as pd_ # kept same convention
